column.name: T_PARENTID
column.valueComputed: (select t_KeyID from dregparm_dbt where t_Name = 'ИНТЕГРАЦИЯ КАФКА' and t_parentid = (select t_KeyID from dregparm_dbt where t_Name = 'БРОКЕРСКОЕ ОБСЛУЖИВАНИЕ' and t_parentid = (select t_KeyID from dregparm_dbt where t_Name = 'РСХБ' AND t_ParentID = 0)))

column.name: T_KEYID
column.valueComputed: (select t_KeyID from dregparm_dbt where t_Name = 'МЕТРИКИ_ОПИСАНИЕ' and t_Type = 2 and t_parentid != 0)

column.name: T_FMTBLOBDATA_XXXX
column.valueComputed: (SELECT to_blob(utl_raw.cast_to_raw('sofr_new_fl_count:Количество новых клиентов СОФР, ФЛ;sofr_change_fl_count:Количество обновлений по текущим клиентам СОФР, ФЛ')) FROM DUAL)
